root.name: Looney Tunes: Sheep Raider
root.description: Overview Looney Tunes: Sheep Raider (known outside North America as "Sheep, Dog, 'n' Wolf") is a puzzle style platfom game where you play as Ralph the wolf (Wile E. Coyote) who is attempting to steal sheep from Sam Sheep Dog. The player must make use of various items and strategies to outsmart Sam and make off with his flock one by one. Story Overview After his failed attempt to steal one of Sam's sheep, Ralph runs into none other than Daffy Duck who declares him the latest contestant for his gameshow. Daffy explains the rules during an opening training session on how he must formulate a stratigic plan to get one of Sam's sheep and bring it to the designated zone to move on to the next section. As Sam begins to realise his flock is disapearing before him the game becomes progressively harder as his vigilance increases.The game is also littered with cameos from other looney toons characters such as Road Runner, Porky Pig, Yosemite Sam and Elmer Fudd.
